name: dwibiascorrect
author: Robert E. Smith
description: Perform B1 field inhomogeneity correction for a DWI volume series using either ANTs or FSL.

inputs.name: Algorithm
inputs.description: Select the algorithm to be used for bias correction. Options are: ants, fsl

inputs.name: Input Image
inputs.description: The input image series to be corrected

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The output corrected image series

inputs.name: Gradient Table (MRtrix format)
inputs.description: Provide the diffusion gradient table in MRtrix format

inputs.name: Gradient Table (FSL bvecs format)
inputs.description: Provide the diffusion gradient table in FSL bvecs format

inputs.name: Mask Image
inputs.description: Manually provide a mask image for bias field estimation

inputs.name: Bias Image
inputs.description: Output the estimated bias field

inputs.name: No Cleanup
inputs.description: Do not delete intermediate files during script execution, and do not delete scratch directory at script completion

inputs.name: Scratch Directory
inputs.description: Manually specify the path in which to generate the scratch directory

inputs.name: Continue Scratch Directory
inputs.description: Continue the script from a previous execution; must provide the scratch directory path

inputs.name: Display Information Messages
inputs.description: Display information messages

inputs.name: Quiet Mode
inputs.description: Do not display information messages or progress status

inputs.name: Debug Mode
inputs.description: Display debugging messages

inputs.name: Force Overwrite
inputs.description: Force overwrite of output files

inputs.name: Number of Threads
inputs.description: Use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading)

inputs.name: Config Key Value
inputs.description: Temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry

inputs.name: Display Help
inputs.description: Display help information and exit

inputs.name: Display Version
inputs.description: Display version information and exit

inputs.name: ANTS N4 Bias Field Correction -b
inputs.description: N4BiasFieldCorrection option -b (initial mesh resolution in mm, spline order)

inputs.name: ANTS N4 Bias Field Correction -c
inputs.description: N4BiasFieldCorrection option -c (number of iterations, convergence threshold)

inputs.name: ANTS N4 Bias Field Correction -s
inputs.description: N4BiasFieldCorrection option -s (shrink-factor applied to spatial dimensions)

output-files.name: Corrected Image Series
output-files.description: File containing the corrected image series

output-files.name: Estimated Bias Field
output-files.description: File containing the estimated bias field
